name: tfr2cot

meta.author: Paul Clifton <paul.clifton@clptak.com>
meta.desc: If msg.payload or env.state is a 2 letter U.S. abbreviation for a state, this node returns a msg.payload as JSON cursor-on-target (CoT) message for use with node-red-contrib-tak node and tcp out node.

name: FAA Data Parse
tag: html body div table tbody tr td.bodyText table tbody tr

name: Convert TFR List to JSON Object
Split TFR Array
NOTAM cot_attrib
JSON to PLI CoT
info:
# JSON 2 COT - PLI

## JSON INPUT
```json
msg.payload = {
    "lat": float,
    "lon": float,
    "altitude": float,
    "callsign": string,
    "uid": string,
    "stale": time,
    "groupName": string,
    "role": string,
    "phone" string //10 digit with no demarcation
}
```
